::Battera::

She stopped walking and stood still. "If you want, I can just tell 
you what I need to tell your leader and I will leave this base if 
that would make you feel better?"
She really didn't want to leave the base at all until she had spoken 
to the leader of the maximals.  But to help a maximal whom she shared 
a common pain with, she would leave and return another time.
